data.actual_result: You are able to successfully mute the channel. (Enabling Hide Muted Channels makes the channel disappear)
data.expected_result: You shouldn't be able to see this option on a channel without messaging capabilities.
data.short_description: You can mute screenshare channels while in screenshare mode in them.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a screenshare enabled channel in a server. - Right click the channel name at the top. - You can mute the channel.
